title: Looking to purchase a Harry Wright Old Judge

posts.post_title: Looking to purchase a Harry Wright Old Judge
posts.post_content:
Will consider most card cuts and conditions. The picture quality is the main thing I am looking for. Would like the actual photo to be as visible as possible with decent contrast.




Sent from my Pixel XL using Tapatalk
Hello, take a look.  I'm looking for $2,500

Thanks for the offer, looking for better contrast/quality photo
